attributes.action: Keep peoples membership to organisations like the Freemasons their own private business if they wish. We would be invading Personal Space and Civil Rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a persons personal choice if they wish to declare membership to such organisations as the Freemasons. It is their private life and has no reflection on their work. We are invading private lives if people are forced to declare such information it is none of our business and in no way affects us.
